title.value: Влияние комплексного биологического препарата для профилактики и терапии респираторных болезней свиней на иммунологические показатели крови лабораторных животных
Influence of a complex biological preparation for preventive maintenance and therapies of pigs respiratory illnesses on blood immunological parameters of laboratory animals
Influence of a complex biological preparation for preventive maintenance and therapies of pigs respiratory illnesses on blood immunological parameters of laboratory animals

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Androsik, L.D., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breding (Belarus). The S.N. Vyshelesskij Inst. of Experimental Veterinary Medicine

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented the results of studies of influence of a complex biological preparation containing a swine recombinant interferon and immunostimulant with different proportions of its components on immunological blood counts of laboratory animal was conducted. It was established that application of complex preparation with proportions of interferon and immunostimulant of 1:1 and 2:1 leads to significant (Р0,05) increase of lysozyme activity of blood serum of 11,4%, bactericidal activity of blood serum of 9,8% at 21 day, that testifies to positive influence of a preparation on parameters of nonspecific resistency of laboratory animals; amount of T-lymphocytes - at 9,8%, B-lymphocytes - at 20,91% at 14 and 21 days in comparison with its initial level in blood of laboratory animals that testifies to its high stimulating activity on cellular immunity of animals.
